items.sentence: You should be able to do that in three hours.
You promised us you wouldn't do that anymore.
You promised that you wouldn't do that again.
You never thought I'd do that again, did you?
You never really enjoyed doing that, did you?
You never got the chance to do that, did you?
You never expected to do that again, did you?
You need to know the reasons why we did that.
You know I didn't want to do that, don't you?
You're not allowed to hunt in national parks.
It's been three days since I've taken a bath.
Mary told me that she didn't love me anymore.
This issue doesn't need to be resolved today.
Was the voice you heard a man's or a woman's?
Tom was the only student who failed the exam.
Tom was late because there was a traffic jam.
The petals were scarlet with streaks of gold.
I think both Tom and Mary are still homesick.
Tom and Mary were both pretty busy yesterday.
Tom thought that his parents were infallible.
